definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: There exists a tight relationship between the geochemical and geophysical steep zones.
sentences.chinese: 地球化學急變帶與地球物理場變化存在密切關係。

sentences.english: The paper discussed the study of biogeochemistry condition of riverine organic matter in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 探討了近年來河流中有機質的生物地球化學研究狀況。

sentences.english: Geological and geochemical features of the Hougou gold deposit are expounded in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了後溝金礦的地質地球化學特徵。

sentences.english: The information of the tectonic geochemistry displays that the Pingdao granite is a intraplate rift type.
sentences.chinese: 構造地球化學信息顯示巖體是大陸裂谷型花崗岩。

sentences.english: Geologic and geochemical evidence supported the metallogenic model of syngenetic hydrothermal metallogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 地質和地球化學證據均支持同生熱液成礦的觀點。

sentences.english: Hydrological zoning in tailings impoundments is the main reason for geochemical zonation.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦庫的水文分帶是導致地球化學分帶的主要原因。

sentences.english: The layer over oil-gas deposits is divided into five geochemical zones in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文把油氣藏上方劃分爲五個地球化學帶。

sentences.english: Light hydrocarbon analysis has applied extensively in the petroleum geochemistry in foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 輕烴分析在國外已廣泛應用於石油地球化學工作中。

sentences.english: This paper introduced a new concept of studying migration ability in element geochemistry-migration potential.
sentences.chinese: 遷移位是研究元素地球化學遷移能力的一個新概念。

sentences.english: Disscusion of orogenic geochemical mapping in theory.
sentences.chinese: 造山帶地球化學編圖的理論探討。

sentences.english: The geochemical province and its boundary are closely related to the geotectonic unit.
sentences.chinese: 地球化學省及其邊界與地質構造單元密切相關。

sentences.english: It is indicated that the chemical heterogeneity of the Earth restricts on the distribution of super-large ore deposit.
sentences.chinese: 最後指出地球化學不均一性對超大型礦牀分佈的制約。

sentences.english: The subvolcanic complex in the orefield has the transitional characteristic in geology, petrology and geochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 這套潛火山雜巖具過渡性地質地球化學特徵。

sentences.english: Special stress is laid upon the discussion on the vertical zoning of the deposits and the geochemical anomaly zoning pattern.
sentences.chinese: 重點討論了礦牀的垂向分帶和地球化學異常分帶模式。

sentences.english: The author attempts to introduce some major achivements and developments of agricultural geochemistry at home and abroad, including the follow…
sentences.chinese: 提出了近期內我國農業地球化學研究的主要任務。

sentences.english: Magnetotactic bacteria may play a significant role in biogeochemical cycles, especially in iron cycle.
sentences.chinese: 它們在生物地球化學循環中起着重要的作用。
